ticket.title: Define PCAC core schemas and deny taxonomy

in_scope: Define AuthorityJoinInputV1 and AuthorityJoinCertificateV1 structures with canonical binding fields.
Define lifecycle receipt schemas (join/revalidate/consume/deny) with canonicalizer and digest metadata requirements.
Define machine-checkable deny taxonomy for lifecycle failures and missing authoritative bindings.
Enforce required revocation-head and authority-join hash bindings in core contracts.

steps: Create/patch schema types for AJC join inputs, certificates, receipts, and deny subclasses.
Add canonicalization and digest metadata validation checks at decode/verify boundaries.
Add unit tests for missing-field, malformed, and deny-taxonomy classification paths.
Link implementation outputs to EVID-0001 expected contents.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: Core PCAC schema surfaces exist with required normative fields.
Lifecycle deny classes are deterministic and machine-checkable.
Missing required authoritative bindings fail closed in tests.

notes.security:
Schema incompleteness must fail closed; no permissive decode path is allowed in
authority-critical artifacts.
notes.verification:
Use deterministic canonicalization vectors and negative tests for all required field
families.
